channel.title: Friend Craft IP: 71.196.239.39:25565
channel.description: Friendcraft is a friendly pvp-free server where no griefing is allowed. Me and the other owner ask that u be kind towards everyone. We have a mob arena, shops, factions, 1 pvp arena and more. it is running on 1.5.2 for now but will update very soon. We need more players who come on regulary for sure. :)
